General.Name: Shenzhen Magic Design & Decoration Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Magic Design & Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. operates in the architectural decoration industry in China. The company operates as a contractor for building decoration, building curtain wall, building electromechanical, electronics and intelligence, electromechanical equipment installation, fire protection facilities, landscaping, engineering designing, laboratory system, and environmental protection engineering works. It serves transportation and government agencies, and cultural industries, as well as financial real estate and hotel sectors. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Scientific Research Building, Building 7, Shenzhen, China, 518029
